Product: HDMI/DVI/VGA/CVBS and SDI (3G/HD/SD) to HDMI/DVI/VGA and SDI (3G/HD/SD) converter with scaler
Description:
HDMI/DVI/VGA/CVBS and SDI (3G/HD/SD) to HDMI/DVI/VGA and SDI (3G/HD/SD) converter with scaler.
- Auto sensing of HDMI/DVI/VGA/SDI/CVBS input signals.
- Concurrent multiple signal type outputs with the same timing, frame rate, and resolutions.
- DVI-D loop-out with area of interest cropping UI.
- Supports VESA graphics and Normal video timings along with SDI and CVBS.
- Support SDI formats (SMPTE 424M, 292M, and 259M).
- Analog stereo audio can be embedded into SDI output with delay.
- LCD module for input and output configuration and setting.
- ScreenCrop with seamless switching between dual instances.

Product: MSM1U Medium Fusion Micro-Adjustable Fixed Wall Mount
Description:
Chief's upgraded fixed wall mounts are based on installer feedback and direct observations of installers in the field. Many new features join Fusion favorites like Centerless shift, ControlZone leveling adjustment and ClickConnect Latching.

New benefits included added stability, faster install, improved lateral shift, easier cable management and enhanced security.

Installer-inspired, Fusion fixed mounts solve top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments for large displays with a low-profile display mounting solution.

Product: LSM1U Large Fusion Micro-Adjustable Fixed Wall Mount
Description: Large Fusion Micro-adjustable Fixed Wall Mount. The installer-inspired fixed mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments and post-installation fine tuning for large flat panel screens. Provides an ultra low-profile mounting solution. Offers post-installation height adjustments and lateral shift for faster and easier installation.

Product: MTM1U Medium Fusion Micro-Adjustable Tilt Wall Mount
Description:
Medium Fusion Micro-adjustable Tilt Wall Mount. This installer-inspired tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering perfect TV positioning and flexible adjustments for medium flat panel screens.

Chief's Fusion tilt wall mounts were developed based on installer feedback and direct observations of installers in the field. Favorite Fusion features include Centerless shift, Centris tilt, ControlZone leveling adjustment and ClickConnect Latching.  

Benefits included increased stability, fast installation, easy cable management and security. 
The installer-inspired Fusion tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments for large displays with a low-profile display mounting solution.

Product: MTMP1U Medium Fusion Portrait Tilt Wall Mount
Description: Medium Fusion Portrait Tilt Wall Mount. The installer-inspired tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering perfect TV positioning and flexible adjustments with a portrait installation for large flat panel screens.

Product: LTM1U Large Fusion Micro-Adjustable Tilt Wall Mount
Description: Large Fusion Micro-adjustable Tilt Wall Mount. The installer-inspired tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering perfect TV positioning and post-installation fine tuning for large flat panel screens. Provides low-profile, fingertip tilt. Easy Accessory attachment.

Product: XSM1U Extra-Large Fusion Micro-Adjustable Fixed Wall Display Mount
Description:
Chief's upgraded fixed wall mounts are based on installer feedback and direct observations of installers in the field. Many new features join Fusion favorites like Centerless shift, ControlZone leveling adjustment and ClickConnect Latching.

New benefits included added stability, faster install, improved lateral shift, easier cable management and enhanced security.

Installer-inspired, Fusion fixed mounts solve top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments for large displays with a low-profile display mounting solution.

Product: XTM1U Extra-Large Fusion Micro-Adjustable Tilt Wall Mount
Description:
Fusion tilt wall mounts were developed based on installer feedback and direct observations of installers in the field. Favorite Fusion features include Centerless shift, Centris tilt, ControlZone leveling adjustment and ClickConnect Latching.  

Benefits included increased stability, fast installation, easy cable management and security. 
The installer-inspired Fusion tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments for large displays with a low-profile display mounting solution.

Product: MCM1U Fusion Medium Flat Panel Ceiling Mount
Description:
Chief's Fusion Flat Panel Ceiling Mounts are installer inspired and offer perfect display positioning and flexible adjustments for large flat panel screens. Great for digital signage installations.

Ceiling Plate and Extension Column are required and must be ordered separately
Compatible with traditional 1.5" NPT and new CPA pinned ceiling plates and column system
See ceiling plates and extension columns (adjustable and Fixed) for 1.5" NPT compatibility
See CPA ceiling plates and CPA columns for pin connection compatibility
Stackable on a single pole when used with CPA columns

Product: LCM1U Fusion Large Flat Panel Ceiling Mount
Description:

Description:

The XCM1U is a single pole drop ceiling mount perfect for Extra-Large displays 5" deep and thinner.  For deeper and heavier displays, see Chief's XCM7000 for a dual drop solution.

Ceiling Plate and extension column are required and must be ordered separately
Compatible with traditional 1.5" NPT and new CPA pinned ceiling plates and column systems

Product: LVS1U Connexsys Video Wall Landscape Mounting System With Rails
Description: ConnexSys Video Wall Landscape Mounting System with Rails. This mount provides the ability to level each row once by using strut channel to connect multiple mounts together with a simple-to-install system that can handle the largest requirements.

Product: LVS1UP Connexsys Video Wall Mount Portrait With Rails
Description: Chiefs ConnexSys Video Wall Mounting System solves common video wall challenges of speed, alignment, serviceability and rigidity. The ConnexSys Video Wall Mounting System provides the ability to level each row once by using strut channel to connect multiple mounts together with a simple-to-install system that can handle the largest requirements.

Product: CSSLP15X10 Component Storage Panel, Slide-Lock Panel
Description:
The Proximity Component Storage Slide-Lock Panel facilitates easy, concealed mounting of AV equipment behind displays. To simplify service and accessories ability to the equipment simply slide the storage panel out. Install on wall or attach to Fusion mounts left, right, or below the display. 

The built-in and tool-free 15" x 10" Lever Lock plate is easily removed and replaced from the slide-lock panel to service the equipment post-installation with out touching the display. with a 15 lb. (6.8 kg) weight capacity, this storage panel will hold most small devices for AV installations. 

The innovative slides on the CSSLP15X10 secure the storage panel and stop it from falling out or down with a push-to-open and push-to-close mechanism. This gives designers, consultants, and installers the flexibility to decide where to best position the storage panel behind the display.
This universal component storage panel supports devices and components near displays in a variety of orientations depending on install preferences.

The Fusion pull-out accessory can be used with any of the updated Fusion microadjustable fixed and tilt wall mounts, including portrait models, to add up to 11.54" (293 mm) extension from the wall. 

Minimum Depth: Retracted depth without mount: 1.56" (39 mm).

Compatible models are MSM1U, LSM1U, XSM1U, MTM1U, LTM1U, XTM1U and MTMP1U.

Product: LPAUB Large Manual Height Adjustable Cart
Description:
This mobile Fusion AV cart incorporates rounded edges and sleek features to give the cart a softer professional feel that fits well in corporate and classroom environments. The height can be adjusted by one person via hand or 1/2" hex bit on a power drill.

Note: shelf and CPU holder accessories sold separately.

Provide aesthetic covering to the rear side of the displays, components and mount using the Chief Fusion Universal Back Covers.

Portrait screen orientation if screen is at least 27" tall and has a 400 x 400mm mounting pattern or smaller

Product: MSD1U Medium Dynamic Height Adjustable Wall Mount
Description:

The height adjustable solution provides ultra-smooth and fast vertical travel with almost no effort. Ships fully assembled with the LSM1U mount to make this a complete aesthetic solution. 

Easy to install. Easy to adjust.

Product: STMS1U Small Tilt Wall Mount Single Stud
Description:
Installer-inspired Fusion tilt mount solves top flat panel installation problems, offering flexible adjustments for small displays with a low-profile display mounting solution. 
This single stud Fusion mount hides better behind narrow bezel displays in the 24-32" range. Many installer-friendly features of Fusion in a smaller form to create superior aesthetic results.

This next-generation design features 0.75 (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 200 lbs (90.7 kg), 1 (25 mm) low-profile depth, and UL and TUV safety standard approvals.

 

Low profile 1 (25 mm) depth facilitates ADA compliance for typical AV design requirements
Easy to reach 0.75 (19 mm) post-installation leveling screw and 10 (254 mm) ball end hex-key included

Supports display mounting patterns up to 960 x 450 mm

Lateral shift with toolless GlideLock secures display to wall plate and allows perfect positioning of screen

Theft deterrent security options (not included) 
UL and TUV safety standards compliant

Product: RMT3 Medium Fit Tilt Display Wall Mount
Description: The Fit series RMT3 is a medium tilt display wall mount for 32" to 65" typical display sizes and supports mounting patterns up to 508 x 450 mm. This next-generation design features 0.75" (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 125 lbs (56.7 kg), 2" (51 mm) low-profile depth, up to 12 degrees tilt, and UL and TUV safety standard approvals.

Product: RXT3 Extra-Large Fit Tilt Display Wall Mount
Description: The Fit series RXT3 is an extra-large tilt display wall mount for 49" (22.8cm) to 98" typical display sizes and supports mounting patterns up to 915 x 650 mm. This next-generation design features 0.75" (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 250 lbs (113.4 kg), 2.5" (64 mm) low-profile depth, up to 12 degrees tilt, and UL and TUV safety standards approved.

This next-generation design features 0.75" (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 250 lbs (113.4 kg), 1.5" (38 mm) low-profile depth, and UL and TUV safety standard approvals.

The Ultrawide Micro-adjustable Static Wall Mount, Extra-Large Kit leverages Fusion features to support displays with 21:9 aspect ratio and ultrawide mounting patterns (up to 1954 mm x 600 mm) in a secure, easy-to-install solution. 
Integrated teardrop design speeds up wall plate installation by allowing pre-installation of the bolts to the wall
ControlZone Leveling for post-installation fine tuning of height and leveling
Centerless Shift provides up to 22.6" (575mm) of post-installation lateral shift for limitless centering
Set screws keep the mount rigid, stable and secure throughout the life of the installation
ClickConnect offers an audible click when the screen safely engages with the mount
Built-in cable stand provides easy accessories under the screen
A full line of accessories can be installed with the mount and the entire unit can be adjusted together
Multiple installation options for various stud distances
Exclusive nesting spacers can be stacked to achieve any depth
Quick-Store Cords use magnets to easily store and accessories pull cords
Improved cable management with New end caps
Integrated Security
Ships with a custom hardware kit that can be hung from mount rails if installing in stages
Easy Open box with less waste to throw away

Product: LVSXU Connexsys Video Wall Mount without Rails
Description: Chief's ConnexSys Video Wall Mounting System solves common video wall challenges of speed, alignment, serviceability and rigidity. The ConnexSys Video Wall Mounting System provides the ability to level each row once by using strut channel to connect multiple mounts together with a simple-to-install system that can handle the largest requirements.

The CSPH Provides storage near the action while eliminating the mess of components and cables underneath conference room tables and desks. With over 350 square inches of secure attachment area, its perfect for ensuring efficient and consistent component placement over large rollouts because it allows installers to populate the panel easily at an on-site or off-site staging area (instead of under each desk) and, once installed, the CSPH pivots 90° to allow access in vertical position (instead of fighting gravity). There are 1/3 and 2/3 breakaways in case less space is required, and because the brackets are sold separately, none of the product goes to waste.

Active Mounting Area: 14 x 25.5 (357 sq. in.); 35.5 x 64.8 cm (2258 square centimeters)

Minimum Depth: 1.15 (0.6" without wall brackets); 29 mm (15 mm without wall brackets)

The CSPR provides over 160 square inches (1032 square centimetres) of secure attachment area for AV equipment independent of display mounts. A handle provides easier accessories while securing equipment and installing. Technicians can remove the Component Storage Panel to service equipment with out removing the display. Ideal for standardizing the deployment of AV component configuration across large projectors. 

Active Mounting Area: 18.5" x 9.0" (166.5 sq. in.)
Minimum Depth: 0.6" (15 mm) without wall brackets; 1.15" (29 mm) with wall brackets

For digital signage applications, many installers want to mount the content generating DMP or CPU near the display. Fusion mounts sit too close to the wall to leave room for larger CPUs. Installers want an option to extend the very popular Fusion mount further from the wall to give space to mount other devices.

Install this storage accessory to safely store PC's and media player devices behind your flat panel displays.

This product is compatible with Fusion ceiling and floor carts and stands. 

Compatible with media player devices up to: (HxWxD) 15.5"x 15.5"x 4.5" (394 x 394 x 114)mm 
Easy access to input/output connections
Ample ventilation
Optional Pad Lock Security
Compatible with Fusion ceiling and floor carts and stands

Up to 11.54 (293 mm) extension when combined with Fusion mount - great for recessed applications.

The FCAX extension brackets can be used with the LVM, LBM, LCM floor and ceiling products to install larger displays and displays with wider mounting patterns.
Please order a quantity of 1 unit per row of monitors. For example, for an LVM3X2U, you would need 2 FCAX brackets.
Kits include two extension brackets (1 for each end of existing Fusion extrusion).
Adds 14" of length to the LVM, LBM, & LCM mounts
Allows LVM, LBM, & LCM to handle up to 60" (152.4cm) displays and 800 mm wide mounting patterns
Easy to add on to any LVM, LBM, & LCM mounts
This custom-designed travel case provides a convenient method for both storage and transportation of your Chief PFC or MFC flat panel mobile carts.

A Height-Adjustable Accessory Shelf designed specifically for use with Chief flat panel mobile carts and floor stands.

Supports Chief's line of flat panel floor stands and mobile carts
Quick installation and height adjustment
Ships fully assembled - no tools required

Product: XBM1U Fusion Extra-Large Single Bolt-Down, Landscape
Description:
Fusion Bolt-Down freestanding solution makes it possible to install extra large displays in prominent locations.

Screen array configuration: 1 screen.

Provide aesthetic covering to the rear side of the displays, components and mount using the Chief Fusion Universal Back Covers.

Works with displays up to 250 lbs (113.4 kg)
Bolt-down solution allows for a permanent install
Easily align displays with independent height, plumb and lateral shift adjustment
Integrated cable management for a clean installation

Product: XVAUB Extra-Large Fusion Video Conferencing Cart
Description: This mobile Fusion AV Cart incorporates rounded edges and sleek features to give the cart a softer professional feel that fits well in corporate and classroom environments. The height can be adjusted by one person via a 1/2" hex bit on a power drill without removing the screen.

Product: FSB018BLK Flat Screen Table Stand Black
Description:
Chief's low-profile FSB018 Table Stand provides smooth adjustments and modular versatility for small flat panel TVs, LCDs and monitors.

Low-profile base frees desk space
adjustable friction for custom feel and touchscreen stability at any angle
0-90° variable viewing angle for data privacy
Height-adjustable for various display sizes and optimal viewing height
Accommodates most 18" (45.7cm) VESA 75 x 75 mm and 100 x 100 mm compliant displays
Easy installation

Product: PDRUB Large Flat Panel Swing Arm Wall Mount, 37" (94cm) Extension
Description: Large Flat Panel Swing Arm Wall Mount - 37" Extension. This swing arm mount allows for perfect flat panel TV placement and ensures ideal viewing from any angle.

Product: TS318TU Medium Dual Swing Arm Wall Mount - 18" (45.7cm) (45 cm) Extension.
Description:
A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall display mount for TVs 32-65". Easily installs with one person by mounting the top rail and sliding on the assembly.

In-wall installation available when TA501 purchased with mount.

Product: TS218SU Medium Single Swing Arm Wall Display Mount - 18" (45.7cm) Extension
Description:
A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall mount for TVs 32-55. 

VESA Mounting Pattern: 100 x 100_ 200 x 100_ 200 x 200_ 300 x 200_ 300 x 300_ 400 x 200 and 400 x 400mm

Product: TS118SU Small Single Swing Arm Wall Display Mount - 18" (45.7cm) Extension
Description: A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall mount for TVs 10-40".

Product: TS318SU Medium Single Swing Arm Wall Display Mount - 18" (45.7cm) Extension
Description: A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall display mount for TVs 32-65".

Product: TS325TU Medium Dual Swing Arm Wall Display Mount - 25" Extension
Description:
A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall display mount for TVs 32-65". Easily installs with one person by mounting the top rail and sliding on the assembly.

Product: TA500 Large Thinstall In-Wall Swing Arm Accessory for TS525TU and TS325TU
Description:

Product: TS110SU Small Single Swing Arm Wall Display Mount - 10" Extension
Description:
A lightweight, low-profile full-motion wall mount for TVs 10-40.

Ultra Low Profile Sleek design collapses to 1.5" (38 mm), providingan ultra-low profile for all types of TVs, including LED, LCD and Plasma.
Extends up to 10" (254 mm) Full extension maximizes viewing potential.
Centris low-profile tilt Provides up to 12° of effortless fingertip tilt toachieve optimal viewing angles.
Integrated Cable Management Enclosed, tool-free cable cover makes it easy to route power and signal cables, and connect to the wall for a seamless installation.
Arms can be positioned on the right or left when in the home position.

Product: RPAU Universal RPA Ceiling Projector Mount, White
Description:
The top-selling ceiling projector mount in the industry! This ceiling projector mount is installed in more offices, schools and homes than any other mount.

Independent roll, pitch and yaw for quick and precise projector registration
Quick connect/disconnect for convenient lamp and filter access on most projectors
Maintains registration when disconnected and doesn't affect preset adjustments
All-Points Security exclusive steel-into-steel locking hardware at all key connection points to protect against theft
Multiple installation options: flush mount to ceiling, mount with 0.25" threaded rods, or mount with 1.5" NPT threaded extension column
Cable management without additional accessories

The RSAUW features a universal interface that offers a compact design for smaller projectors with all the same great features as the standard RPA Series.

Compact design is smaller than the RPA by 1/3 and includes the same great features
Independent roll, pitch and yaw for quick and precise projector registration
Quick connect/disconnect with convenient lamp and filter access on most projectors
Disconnecting maintains registration and doesn't affect preset adjustments
All-Points Security steel-into-steel locking hardware at all connection points protects against theft
Multiple installation options including: flush mount to ceiling, use 0.25" threaded rods, or use a 1.5" NPT column

Product: RSMAU Mini Elite Universal Projector Mount, Black
Description: Ideal for smaller projector models, these miniature versions of the RPA Elite ceiling projector mounts include all the same great features in almost half the size.

Product: RSMAU Mini Elite Universal Projector Mount, White
Description: Ideal for smaller projector models, these miniature versions of the RPA Elite ceiling projector mounts include all the same great features in almost half the size.

Product: VCMU Heavy Duty Universal Projector Mounts
Description:
This mount provides the strong support you need for mounting heavy LCD/CRT projectors. Micro adjustments allow you to quickly achieve registration. The VCMU mount includes the universal HBU bracket that is compatible with most heavy duty projectors.

Independent roll, pitch and yaw adjustments for quick and precise projector registration
Multiple installation options: flush mount to ceiling, use 0.5" threaded rods, use a 1.5" NPT extension column
Quick connect/disconnect for convenient lamp and filter access on most projectors
Cable management through top of the mount without additional accessories
Easy 3-Step Installation
 1) Assemble legs to projector
 2) Fasten legs to universal bracket
 3) Hook bracket onto VCM mount
Heavy Duty Steel Construction

Product: VPAUB Vertical and Portrait Projector Mount, Black
Description:
Chiefs VPAU enables projectors to be positioned in multiple orientations including popular vertical and portrait digital signage applications. A great solution for projectors that are equipped with multi-direction capabilities.

Requires a column and ceiling adapter, ordered separately. See accessory tab on product pages for more.

Independent roll, pitch and yaw for quick and precise projector registration
Quick connect / disconnect for easy installation and servicing
Maintains registration when disconnected and doesn't affect preset adjustments
Solid steel construction

Product: VCTUB Extra-Large Universal Tool-Free Projector Mount, Black
Description: The VCTUB Extra-Large Universal Tool-free projector mount was designed to install quickly while maintaining a sleek aesthetic. Lighter and slimmer than its predecessor, the VCM, the VCT works well with laser projector between 50-150 lbs (22.7 - 68 kg). Tool-free MicroZone adjustment ensures accurate and reliable image registration.

Product: RMF3 Medium Fit Fixed Display Wall Mount
Description: The Fit series RMT3 is a medium tilt display wall mount for 32" to 65" typical display sizes and supports mounting patterns up to 508 x 450 mm. This next-generation design features 0.75" (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 125 lbs (56.7 kg), 2" (51 mm) low-profile depth, up to 12 degrees tilt, and UL and TUV safety standard approvals.

Product: RLT3 Large Fit Tilt Display Wall Mount
Description: The Fit series RLT3 is a large tilt display wall mount for 43" to 86" typical display sizes and supports mounting patterns up to 915 x 450 mm. This next-generation design features 0.75" (19 mm) post-installation leveling, robust wall plate design supporting up to 200 lbs (90.7 kg), 2" (51 mm) low-profile depth, up to 12 degrees tilt, and UL and TUV safety standard approvals.

Product: WM230S Large Short Throw Wall Mount (Dual Stud)
Description:
WM230S provides ideal placement and alignment for short throw projector mounting on dual studs.

Compatible with the RPA, RPA Elite, RPA Mini and RPA Elite Mini Series projector mounts (must order mount separately)
Also supports wall-mounted long-throw projectors.
Fast installation with innovative quick-connect system
Industry-first micro height and leveling adjustment
Integrated lateral shift
Telescoping extension, 2.5'-4.5' (76.2-137.2 cm)
Precision image alignment with micro roll, pitch and yaw (using the RPA Elite mounts)

Compatible with the RPA, RPA Elite, RPA Mini and RPA Elite Mini Series projector mounts
Includes short throw arm only, projector mount must be ordered separately
Includes hardware for wood stud, steel stud and concrete wall construction

Product: CMA270 Coupler to Connect 2 Threaded Poles, Black
Description:
A threaded pipe coupler that connects two 1.5" NPT threaded columns together for added length.

Connects two extension columns for extended length applications
2.06" (52mm) height added to installation
two set screws included for security and stability

Product: CMA348 Large Venue Vibration Isolator Coupler
Description:
The CMA Large Venue Vibration Isolating Coupler reduces image movement caused by common building vibrations like HVAC, foot traffic, road traffic and doors shutting. The patented design works as a projector mount vibration isolator by connecting two Chief CMS columns (1.5" NPT) and limiting vibrations that are transmitted to the lower column. The CMA348 is for systems between 35-100 lbs (45.4 kg).
Systems include all weight below the vibration isolator, including column, projector mount and projector 
Average weights of common mounts include: RPAU (4 lbs or 1.8 kg), RPMAU (5 lbs or 2.3 kg), and VCMU (33 lbs or 15 kg). 
Average weight of CMS columns under 12" (30.4cm) in length are 1 lb (0.5 kg) or less

The CPA column system hosts many installation inspired features along with an aesthetic finish. 

Dual Pin Connection
Connection is achieved by fastening two thread forming screws at each column end into factory pre-drilled holes.
The fasteners do not pass completely through the center of the column enabling cable pass though
Flexible Inventory
Can be cut to length to customize your installation
Can be re-drilled
Can also be threaded to 1.5" NPT 
Compatibility
Compatible with dedicated pin connection ceiling plates (see CPA Plates)
Compatible with all Chief Ceiling Plates (see CPA261 and CPA262)
Professional Appearance
Grooves in outer surface of column provide an aesthetic appearance and also act as drill guides
Multiple Length Options

Product: FCAX08 Fusion Freestanding and Ceiling Extension Bracket
Description:
The FCAX extension brackets can be used with the LVM, LBM, LCM floor and ceiling products to install larger displays and displays with wider mounting patterns.

Please order a quantity of 1 unit per row of monitors. For example, for an LVM3X2U, you would need 2 FCAX brackets.
Kits include two extension brackets (1 for each end of existing Fusion extrusion).
Adds 8" of length to the LVM, LBM, & LCM mounts
Allows LVM, LBM, & LCM to handle up to 60" (152.4cm) displays and 800 mm wide mounting patterns
Easy to add on to any LVM, LBM, & LCM mounts

Product: K1D120B Kontour K1D Dynamic Desk Clamp Mount, 1 Monitor
Description:
The enhanced KontourK1D Dynamic Height-adjustable Desk Clamp Mounts are the perfect monitor mount solutions for the office, healthcare facilities or home. Best-in-class weight capacity range makes specification simple!

Key enhancements have been made to Chief's patented CentrisExtreme Tilt technology for the ultimate in effortless fingertip monitor positioning. Kontour monitor mounts float your displays in the optimal ergonomic position above your work surface to create a more productive and comfortable work space.
Best-in-class weight capacity range of 5 to 25 lbs. makes specification simple
No need to pay more for that "heavy duty" arm to support your Apple monitor or All-in-One!
Sleek, solidly-constructed forged aluminum arms in subtlesilver and black finishes
Enhanced patented CentrisExtreme Tilt provides +75°, -10° of effortless tilt, for optimal viewing comfort whether sitting or standing
13" (330 mm) of dynamic height adjustment using smooth motion gas-spring technology
Enhanced 3-step installation and quick-release monitor interface for easy mounting and maintenance, with included tool storage in the updated base
Easily clamps to edge of desk, through standard grommet hole, or through bolt hole with included kit
Tool-free cable management covers for a clean, professional look
With high levels of recycled content & a highly-recyclable design, Chief Kontourmonitor arms may contribute to valuable LEED-CI, -NC, and -EB credits!
See our LEED Flyer for more details
Most Kontour K1 products are TAA-compliant - see respective product pages for details

Product: BYOD: USB 3.0 devices to 2 PC switcher
Description: INOGENIs TOGGLE USB 3.0 Pro-AV switcher allows anyone in a conference room to access highquality USB devices (cameras, microphones) in mere seconds. The TOGGLE USB 3.0 professional switcher can connect to three USB 3.0 devices and switch them between two hosts. It will automatically switch to a laptop when it is connected, and revert back to the conference rooms computer when disconnected. It can also be controlled remotely by RS-232 or GPI.

Product: 4K BYOD/BYOM: 2 PCs SWITCHER FOR USB 3.0/HDMI DEVICES
Description: TOGGLE ROOMS connects to three USB 3.0 devices and one HDMI displays across two PC hosts, ensuring a pro-AV, unified communication system with a remarkable 4Kp60 resolution. You can seamlessly switch from a Room PC to a laptop host, ensuring a friendly and efficient meeting experience. TOGGLE ROOMS seamlessly integrates into a Room PC environment, allowing users to connect peripherals and charge their laptops via versatile options, such as USB-C or USB-B and HDMI for older laptop models. This flexibility extends across various settings, from huddle rooms to large boardrooms, classrooms, and auditoriums, making it an ideal solution for unified videoconferences.

INOGENI HOST BUTTON an elegant, high-quality metal-grade switch designed to subtly enhance conference tables. With a sleek, illuminated design, this button effortlessly toggles between room PC and laptop hosts, providing a seamless and sophisticated solution for BYOM scenarios. It is easy to install and designed for aesthetic integration into modern conference spaces.

INOGENI INO USBC-2M100W 20Gbps cable, tailor-made to complement the BYOD/BYOM TOGGLE ROOMS 2 PCs switcher. This cable, which supports DisplayPort up to 4K60 + USB2.0 or 4K30 + USB3.0, delivers unparalleled performance. Wide-screen capabilities and seamless backward compatibility ensure optimal connectivity in any meeting room scenario.
The cable also supports 100W Power Delivery, making it an ideal add-on for TOGGLE ROOMS. It guarantees efficient charging and connectivity for a hassle-free BYOD/BYOM videoconferencing experience.

Description: This easy Plug-And-Go mixer capturing 2 Picture-In-Picture or side-by-side video sources in one video flow is equally perfect to enhance the experience of your HyFlex classes and collaborative meetings.

Description:
The INOGENI CAM230 is a USB and HDMI multi-camera switcher that helps improve meeting equity in virtual meetings. With its easy-to-use camera switching capabilities and support for bidirectional audio with videobars, facilitators can ensure that all participants have equal opportunities to speak and contribute.
The CAM230 also supports whiteboard and document cameras for added collaboration and productivity.

Keep the flow of your engaging presentation and change camera or mix with a simple click button. INOGENIs REMOTE control keypad enables longer distance to select the camera mixer configuration for the CAM300 and CAM230, simplifying the control of camera selectors.

Product: USB Camera & Audio to HDMI converter
Description:
One product for 2 USB applications. U-CAM USB camera and audio to HDMI converter with USB. U-CAM Special application - Solve USB tier limitations.

The U-CAM connect USB cameras with or without advanced AI to CODEC's HDMI inputs, thereby optimizing the installed assets. It also helps to achieve better meeting experiences and meeting equity because everyone has access to high-quality images and sound.

Whats more, new smart applications, such as Huddly Canvas for whiteboards, as well as other AI technologies, including face tracking, body movement recognition, automatic zooming, and automatic color and exposition balancing need to leverage the tremendous potential USB and AI USB cameras offer.

The U-BRIDGE USB 2.0 video camera and audio extender enables high-speed USB 2.0 connections up to 100 m /330 ft. over a single CAT 5e/6/7 cable.
For cameras and any USB 2.0 peripheral, the new U-BRIDGE USB 2.0 extender is the solution to the interoperability challenges faced by AV installers looking for a reliable long-distance USB camera extension to maintain high-quality video.

Pro:Centric Direct is a powerful content management solution specifically tailored for the hospitality industry. Its flexible and scalable design allows businesses to easily manage and oversee their TV networks from a centralised location, providing guests and customers with a personalised, interactive and immersive viewing experience. Using Pro:Centric Direct, hotels, resorts and other businesses can customise and brand their TVs with their own logos, graphics and messages, as well as offer guests access to a variety of interactive services such as room service, weather updates and information about the hotel.

ConnectedCare is a powerful cloud-based solution that provides remote monitoring and control of LG signage devices. Through active monitoring ConnectedCare reports abnormal operating conditions in your signage displays, ensuring stable operation and minimising device downtime. This proactive approach ensures uninterrupted display of your business content. With the ability to remotely change device settings and manage multiple devices at once, ConnectedCare saves you time and money on costly on-site visits, making it the ultimate solution for signage operators. DMS is only for the CreateBoard series. Free trial licenses are available.
